text: João Coelho Neto, known more commonly as Preguinho (8 February 1905 – 1 October 1979) is a former Brazilian football player. He was the first Brazilian player to score a goal at FIFA World Cup playing for Brazil national team. Category:1905 births Category:1979 deaths Category:Footballers from Rio de Janeiro Category:1930 FIFA World Cup players
title: Preguinho
